title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Install package available RStudio using install.packages("available"). find suggestions valid package names use available::suggest(text="description package "). can also check whether package name available using available::available("pkgname"). title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Install devtools RStudio using install.packages("devtools"). set packages support various aspects package development (includes usethis package ).

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: stage, can try devtools::check() see issues package. toolchain required build R package missing system, RStudio alert stage. Please refer Toolchain building R packages done run devtools::check() . raise issue missing/non-standard license DESCRIPTION file (issue fixed soon!).

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: DESCRIPTION file contains metadata package. can add descriptive text package Title Description fields. can also fill author maintainer details. Manually add BSD-3-Clause license (recommended) first repository DESCRIPTION file. Run devtools::check() verify everything works (now, raises note “Licence stub invalid DCF.”)

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Use usethis::use_readme_rmd() initialize basic, executable README.Rmd file. README.Rmd can add purpose package, provide installation instructions, show example package can used. Remember render README.Rmd file (time make change ) make README.md file. can running devtools::build_readme().

what: Add R files and corresponding unit tests
title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Create R function file using usethis::use_r("filename"). filename.R file created R/ directory can populate. Create corresponding unit test file using usethis::use_test("filename"). test-filename.R file created tests/testthat/ directory can add unit tests.

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Use devtools::document set documentation package. Delete template R/hello.R file. Now open R file (created) want add documentation (, R/add.R file). Put cursor somewhere function definition. , Code > Insert roxygen skeleton. comment structure appear function, line begins #’. Edit comments suitably. NAMESPACE file already exists, please delete can automatically generated roxygen2. , run devtools::document() also create corresponding filename.Rd file man/filename.Rd using roxygen2.

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Run install.packages("pkgdown"). configure package use deploy pkgdown, run usethis::use_pkgdown_github_pages(). add necessary components sets GitHub Actions automatic site building deploying. preview site locally publishing, run pkgdown::build_site(). see warning “package use installed”, : Run search() see package loaded. , run detach("package:pkgname", unload = TRUE) unload . Run search() verify package longer loaded. run pkgdown::build_site() preview site locally. README.md becomes homepage, documentation man/ generates function reference, vignettes rendered articles/.

title: Guidelines to create an R package
text: Add GitHub action workflow render Rmarkdown using usethis::use_github_action("render-rmarkdown"). Add another action lint package using usethis::use_github_action("lint"). add workflow R CMD check, use usethis::use_github_action() select 1 (first option). Add R CMD-check badge using usethis::use_github_actions_badge(). add package DESCRIPTION file, use usethis::use_package("pkgname"). Customise package website editing _pkgdown.yml file. example, can add lightswitch GitHub repository button navbar:
code: template:   bootstrap: 5   light-switch: true navbar:   structure:     right: [search, github, lightswitch]   components:     github:       icon: fa-github       href: https://github.com/<owner-name>/<repo-name>       aria-label: GitHub
